entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, 1.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: CFB Trenton 10:46 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: 1.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.9 kPa falling
Visibility: 3.2 km
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 0.9°C
Wind: SW 39 km/h gust 59 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind east 40 km/h becoming southwest 70 gusting to 110 this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 19 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow and blizzard. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Snow or blizzard. Blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind southwest 70 km/h gusting to 120. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
